docs.snippet: While the expectations for the Russian men’s hockey team are high, any medal for the women would be a momentous achievement....
docs.lead_paragraph: While the expectations for the Russian men’s hockey team are high, any medal for the women would be a momentous achievement.
docs.abstract: Russian women’s hockey team has not finished higher than fifth in three previous Olympic appearances, but after winning a bronze medal at 2013 world championships, team is in the hunt for a podium finish; while expectations for superstar-laden men’s national team are high, any medal for the women would be a momentous achievement.

headline.main: Warming to Women on the Ice
